Interface ConfigurationService

    public interface ConfigurationService
    The interface Configuration service.

        List<org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.VersionDto> findVacantSchemasByEndpointGroupId(String endpointGroupId)
        Find all vacant configuration schemas by group id. Will be returned schema list where isn't related active or inactive configurations.
        Parameters:
        endpointGroupId - the group id
        Returns:
        the list of schema objects

      • activateConfiguration

        org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.ChangeConfigurationNotification activateConfiguration(String id,
                                                                                    String activatedUsername)
        Activate configuration. Activate existing inactive configuration. After that last active configuration will be deactivated. Also will be added information to history HistoryService.saveHistory(HistoryDto)}
        Parameters:
        id - the string id
        activatedUsername - the activated username
        Returns:
        the change configuration notification

      • deactivateConfiguration

        org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.ChangeConfigurationNotification deactivateConfiguration(String id,
                                                                                      String deactivatedUsername)
        Deactivate configuration. Deactivate existing active configuration and delete if exists inactive.
        Parameters:
        id - the id
        deactivatedUsername - the deactivated username
        Returns:
        the change configuration notification

      • deleteConfigurationRecord

        org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.ChangeConfigurationNotification deleteConfigurationRecord(String schemaId,
                                                                                        String groupId,
                                                                                        String deactivatedUsername)
        Delete configuration record.
        Parameters:
        schemaId - the configuration schema id
        groupId - the endpoint group id
        deactivatedUsername - the deactivated username
        Returns:
        the change configuration notification

      • saveConfSchema

        org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.ConfigurationSchemaDto saveConfSchema(org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.ConfigurationSchemaDto configurationSchema,
                                                                    String groupId)
        Save Configuration schema. Please see saveConfSchema(ConfigurationSchemaDto,String)
        Parameters:
        configurationSchema - the configuration schema
        groupId - group id for generated default configuration based on schema
        Returns:
        the configuration schema dto

      • saveConfSchema

        org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.ConfigurationSchemaDto saveConfSchema(org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.ConfigurationSchemaDto configurationSchema)
        Save Configuration schema. During saving new configuration schema will be generated:
        • Base Schema
        • Override Schema
        • Protocol Schema
        • Base Data - Configuration attached to default group
        After that will added information to history HistoryService.saveHistory(HistoryDto historyDto)
        Parameters:
        configurationSchema - the configuration schema
        Returns:
        the configuration schema dto

      • findConfSchemaById

        org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.ConfigurationSchemaDto findConfSchemaById(String id)
        Find configuration schema by id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id
        Returns:
        the configuration schema dto

        Remove configuration schemas by application id.
        Parameters:
        appId - the application id
